data.meta_site_name: Prince & Princess F. Academy Building Project
data.text:
About us FAQs

WHAT IS THE PRINCE AND F. PRINCESS ACADEMY PROJECT ABOUT?

The Prince and Princess F. Academy project is comprised of a group of individuals from different cultures who share the same goal of building a school in a community in Tamale, Ghana, to provide quality education for children. Click here to read more…

WHEN DID THE PROJECT/TEAM START?

The Prince and Princess F. Academy Project and website officially launched on the 22nd of August 2013.

WHO SUPPORTS THE PRINCE AND PRINCESS ACADEMY PROJECT?

Our donation base is international, as we are now receiving a few donations from people around the world. Most of our donations come from people who also give us the motivation to do more.

HOW MANY ORGANIZATIONS/COMPANIES SUPPORT THE PROJECT?

We have a few companies supporting the project – these are listed on the “Supporters and Partners” page. We welcome any organization or company that wishes to support or partner with us to make this school-building project a success.

Project FAQs

CAN I TRAVEL TO GO AND HELP BUILD THE SCHOOL?

The Prince and Princess F. Academy Team can not send volunteers or groups to help build a school. We are a small team and do not have the financial capacity to fund travel and arrangements for volunteers. However, individuals or organizations that have the financial ability and formal skills in building and construction are invited to come and help build the school.

WHAT HAS THE TEAM DONE SO FAR WITH THE PROJECT?

Our project team has completed the construction of 5 classrooms and the school was opened on 18th January, 2021. We are currently raising funds to expand the school to the basic level. Great progress has been made, but we still need your support to continue the project.

Donation FAQ

HOW DO I MAKE A DONATION TO THE PROJECT?

1. Donations can be made to us online. Click here to donate

2. Donations can also be made to us through MoneyGram and Western Union Money Transfer. Click here to contact us if you wish to make a donation through MoneyGram, Western Union Money transfer or any other global money transfer service.

3. If you wish to donate to us via Paypal or other payment system click here.

HOW MUCH CAN I DONATE?

Please feel free to make any amount of donation. All donations made to our project will go directly toward helping to build the Prince and F. Princess Academy.

DO I GET ANY REWARD FOR MAKING A DONATION?

Yes! It is the culture of the Project Team to show appreciation to donors for donating to the school project. Donation rewards range from postcards and recognition and honorary reward with respect to the amount donated. You can contact us for more details.

I WOULD LIKE TO DONATE IN MEMORY OF A FAMILY MEMBER. HOW DO I GO ABOUT DOING THIS?

Memorial donations provide you with the opportunity to send a special print or electronic card to let the family know that a donation has been made in their memory. Click here to contact us for a Memorial donation.

WHAT BENEFITS CAN ORGANISATION,COMPANIES AND BUSINESS GAIN FROM SUPPORTING/PARTNERING WITH OUR SCHOOL BUILDING PROJECT.

In addition to being seen as fulfilling your organization’s, company’s or business’s social responsibility of “giving back” by contributing to the construction of this school, we will also advertise your products and services on our website.

CAN I DONATE EDUCATIONAL MATERIALS?

You are welcome to donate educational materials and learning tools to us. Click here to contact us if you wish to donate Educational materials or learning materials to the Team.

DOES THE PRINCE AND F. PRINCESS PROJECT TEAM TRADE, SELL OR RENT DONOR INFORMATION?

No, the project team does not exchange, in any way, shape or form, donor information. We value the support of our donors and do not believe in providing this information to others.

Click here to contact us if you have further questions.

Postcards FAQ

How do I order or buy your postcards? Please select the postcard(s) you wish to buy and fill in your name or the name of the receiver, mailing address, country and click submit. Then click on the ‘Paypal button’ to make your payment or you can send your payment to the Paypal email above. Do not forget to add your correct email address so that the team can write to you to confirm the mailing address before the postcard is sent.

How much is the postcard? Each postcard costs €10 (euros) but if you wish to pay more for the postcards it will be highly supportive and well appreciated.

You didn’t receive an email? If you have not received an email from us after 24 hours of making an order please contact us to verify your order.

What do I do if my postcard didn’t arrive? If you have not received your postcard(s) for more than 90 days please contact us again and we will send it again.

Can the students of the Prince & Princess F. Academy write a card for me? Yes, when you order 3 or more postcards, one of the cards will be written by a student of the school.

Does the Prince and F. Princess Academy project team trade, sell or rent donor information? No, the project team does not exchange, in any way, shape or form, donor information. We value the support of our donors and do not believe in providing this information to others in any circumstances.

Can I send you a photo or selfie of the postcards I received? Sure you can send us photos or selfies when you receive our postcards and we can share them on the website too.
